title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS – Toyota LC Prado (up to 2015) 120 150 Series – Pre Filter Water Separator Kit Fuel Manager

content.rendered:
Fuel Manager Vehicle Specific Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:

Toyota LC Prado (up to 2015)
120 & 150 Series / D4D Single Battery

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality.
The kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it !

Kit FM620DPK Includes:
• 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager
Made by Stanadyne in the USA !
(Filters down to 30 Microns !)
• Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts
• Spare 30 Micron Filter
• 2 Mtr of 3/8″ Quality Fuel hose
• Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket
• 3/8″ Inch Straight Barb Fittings
• Blanking Plugs
• Hose Clamps
• Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
